name: Hecate MCP Server
description: MCP server for Hecate API - medical concept search and retrieval

tools.name: search_concepts
tools.description: Search for OMOP Standardized Vocabulary concepts using text query. Returns medical concepts with similarity scores from over 100 vocabularies including SNOMED CT, ICD-10-CM, RxNorm, LOINC, and more.

tools.name: get_concept_by_id
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific OMOP concept by its unique concept ID. Returns concept metadata including name, domain, vocabulary, concept class, and validity dates.

tools.name: get_concept_relationships
tools.description: Get related concepts for a specific OMOP concept. Returns relationships like 'Maps to', 'Subsumes', 'Is a', enabling navigation through concept hierarchies and cross-vocabulary mappings.

tools.name: get_concept_phoebe
tools.description: Get PHOEBE-defined relationships for a specific OMOP concept. PHOEBE provides curated clinical relationships optimized for phenotype definitions and cohort building.

tools.name: get_concept_definition
tools.description: Get the clinical definition from UMLS for a specific OMOP concept if available. Returns detailed descriptions to help understand the medical meaning and clinical context.

tools.name: expand_concept_hierarchy
tools.description: Get the hierarchical structure of an OMOP concept including children and parents. Useful for exploring clinical taxonomies and building comprehensive phenotype definitions.
